cause.description:
I believe everyone deserves a nice pair of legs. If you agree, please donate to help "Bumble Bee" from Transformers, to making a full recovery by getting his legs patched up and out back out on the streets.
1. Legs for all. All for legs.
cause.mission: provide Bumble Bee from Transformers with a pair of robo legs.
cause.name: Save Bumble Bee's Legs!
